animeList.name: Naruto
animeList.description: A young ninja strives to become the strongest ninja and protect his village.

animeList.name: Attack on Titan
animeList.description: Humanity fights for survival against monstrous titans in a post-apocalyptic world.

animeList.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animeList.description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies.

animeList.name: My Hero Academia
animeList.description: A young boy born without superpowers strives to become the greatest hero.

animeList.name: Death Note
animeList.description: A high school student discovers a notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

animeList.name: One Piece
animeList.description: A group of pirates seeks the legendary One Piece treasure to become the Pirate King.

animeList.name: Demon Slayer
animeList.description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

animeList.name: Sword Art Online
animeList.description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must fight their way to freedom.

animeList.name: Tokyo Ghoul
animeList.description: A college student becomes half-ghoul and struggles to survive in a world of humans and ghouls.

animeList.name: Hunter x Hunter
animeList.description: A young boy embarks on a journey to become a Hunter and find his father.
